post.text: THANK YOU CLEVELAND! See you tomorrow- at the #GOPConvention! #RNCinCLE

comment.text: You are so blessed God is going to pull you through this.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: The idea that cruz used that poor baby who lost her father! OMG how sad and ruthless! How shameful! It was a superb moment when trump took back control of the rook from that pig cruz! Eric did great, and yeah, newt was wonderful! I THINK CRUZ JUST UNITED THE REPUBLICAN PARTY! TRUMP-PENCE!
